mapper.select:
select ai.id, ai.user_id, ai.images, ai.create_date, ai.audit_status, ai.status_date, ai.introduction, ai.tag,
si.code, si.name, si.sex, si.images as userImages, si.create_date, si.phone, si.address, si.ethnicity, si.real_name, si.id_number, si.birth_date, si.id_card_front_images, si.id_card_reverse_images, si.service_score from audit_info ai left join staff_info si on (ai.user_id = si.id) where 1 = 1
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryFrom.name},'%')
AND si.id_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryFrom.idNumber},'%')
AND si.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{queryFrom.phone},'%')
AND ai.audit_status = #{queryFrom.auditStatus}
AND si.user_id = #{queryFrom.staffId}
order by ai.create_date desc
